title: Empress Unveiled
description: What if a magical touch meant leaving everything you loved behind?I was supposed to die. The doctors told me I had only two months to live.That was before I met him. Daylan.He was the miracle cure I had been waiting for. With Daylan , I was no longer the small-town girl with that unexplained illness. I was something more. The fate of a magical world depended on my survival, and I longed to go with him. There was only one thing stopping me.Tyler.For fans of fantastical adventures, unexplained magic and deadly romance.
author: Jenna Morland
